name: unit
description: The details of units which are used to measure service capacity.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the unit object. Each unit must have a unique identifier.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The human-readable name for this unit e.g. “Bed” or “Hours”

scheme.name: scheme
scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The scheme which formalizes the unit, if applicable e.g. “SI” for Standard International Units such as Kilogram, Litre, etc.

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.title: Unit Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier of the unit taken from the scheme if applicable e.g. `kgm` for Kilogram.

uri.name: uri
uri.title: URI
uri.description: The URI to the definition of the unit, if applicable

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
